name: Tales of Casinthia
description:
The land of Terra Deorum is overrun  by an ancient evil known as the Titans.

As the people's faith in the Gods fades, the Titans grow stronger, ready to again, make a push to reclaim the universe as their own.

You awaken from your slumber, startled by a dark prophecy. Determined to stop it from coming true, you must take your band of heroes and slay the Titans, absorb their power, and claim your place among the Gods!

Tales of Casinthia is an RPG game based in the mythical land of Terra Deorum. It uses a 2D format with a pixel-art based art scheme. The game is in an early Alpha state that is being worked on independently, yet, it has plans to become a fully fledged game, complete with compelling characters and an inspired story. Feedback would be greatly appreciated as I would like to encourage audience involvement in the development of this game. Thank you for taking the time to experience Tales of Casinthia.
